definitions.definition: Willing to respond to persuasion or suggestions .
Liable to be brought to account, to a charge or claim; responsible ; accountable ; answerable .
Liable to the legal authority of (something).
Being a locally compact topological group carrying a kind of averaging operation on bounded functions that is invariant under translation by group elements.

main_definition: Willing to respond to persuasion or suggestions .
secondary_definitions: Liable to be brought to account, to a charge or claim; responsible ; accountable ; answerable .
( law ) Liable to the legal authority of (something).
( mathematics , of a group ) Being a locally compact topological group carrying a kind of averaging operation on bounded functions that is invariant under translation by group elements.
